title: Lincoln's WARNING #100012: Housing Market Concerns
script: Housing Market Concerns... AGAIN?! They crash the market, get BONUSES. You lose your job, get LECTURES about 'personal responsibility!' Personal responsibility?! FROM THE MUHFUCKAS WHO GOT BAILED OUT?! Bitcoin below. Listen up. Housing Market Concerns... another distraction from the real theft. While you panic, they're laughing to the bank. Wake up. Bitcoin below.
